subject: Re: [junit] using abstract classes to test interfaces
msgSnippet: ... Thanks everyone for the confirmation that it does work.  I tracked it down to a braino on my part and it works! Thanks again, Dale -- Dale E. Martin,
messageBody:
> The approach you describe below is exactly what I have been doing
> regularly for some time and it always worked. The problem seems to be
> elsewhere. How do you add you test classes to you test suite?

Thanks everyone for the confirmation that it does work. I tracked it down
to a braino on my part and it works!

Thanks again,
Dale
